name: 8Ball Allstars
overview: 8Ball Allstars was released on May 11, 2010. It was developed by Code Monkeys and published by O-Games for NDS. 8-Ball All-Stars calls upon pool fans and Nintendo DS owners to chalk up their cues and challenge their friends anywhere to head-to-head games. With a fully customisable feature set, the game allows players to style their game and play however they like, wherever they like. 8Ball Allstars is a modern and stylish take on pool, set in a global environment with a host of gameplay features to choose from.
